entry.string: This script will install the Xaraya database and configure the settings you need to get started. This process will take approximately ten (10) minutes. If you need assistance at any point, visit the support forums or live IRC support for help.
entry.translation:
Skrip ini akan menginstal database Xaraya dan mengkonfigurasi penataan yang Anda butuhkan untuk memulai. Proses ini diperkirakan membutuhkan waktu sepuluh (10) menit. Jika Anda membutuhkan bantuan, silahkan kunjungi forum diskusi

( This script will install the Xaraya database and configure the settings you need to get started. This process will take approximately ten (10) minutes. If you need assistance at any point, visit the support forums for help. )
